lines.text: Well now you have two. Hey, I am good at math.

lines.speaker: joey

lines.text: No! Listen, Im not gonna go through this with you again, okay. Just once I wanna beat when you cant blame it on the broken nose, the buzzer, or the fact that you thought you were getting mono. Lets just call this, tie score and its halftime.

lines.text: No ah, hold on a second Joe, where do Dutch people come from?

lines.text: Y'know what, it doesnt matter, cause she picked me. Me! From now on I get the dates and you have to stay home on Saturday nights watching Ready, Set, Cook!

lines.text: All right Rachel, you sweep behind, Ill pitch it to you, you throw it down field to Phoebe. All right. Break.

lines.text: Let go!

lines.text: Well, Im pretty tired from lugging the trees around all day. Hey, Phoebe listen, you got this all wrong. Those trees were born to be Christmas trees, their fulfilling their life purpose, by, by making people happy.

lines.text: Gee, I always heard them talk about that, I just always thought that it was a club they went to. Oh God, Im, Im sorry.

lines.text: No. The one in Atlantic City, Dad loves the slots. He says hes gonna double the college money my Grandma left me.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Huh. Well, good luck to Dad. Say, how many more boxes would you have to sell in order to win?

lines.text: The girl who won last year sold four hundred and seventy-five.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: sarah

lines.speaker: ross

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: And what is second prize?

lines.speaker: sarah

lines.text: Well, that makes sense.

lines.speaker: sarah
lines.text: Could you do me one favor, if its not too much trouble?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, Sarah, anything.

lines.speaker: sarah
lines.text: Could you pull open the curtains for me? The astronauts from the space shuttle are gonna be on the news, and since we dont have a TV, the lady across the alley said shed push hers up to a window, so I could watch it.

lines.text: Yesss?

lines.text: Hi, Im selling Brown Bird cookies.

lines.text: I can dial 9-1-1 at the touch of a button, y'know. Now, go away!

lines.text: No, please, please, um, its for a poor little girl who wants to go to Spacecamp more than anything in the world.

lines.text: Hey.

lines.text: Well, I-I thought a lot about what you said, and um, I realilized duh, all right maybe I was a little judgmental. Yeah,  oh, but oh...

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Destiny.

lines.text: Sure.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yes.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: All right.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay.  Yikes! That one doesnt look very fulfilled.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, thats, thats ah, one of the old ones, hes just taking it to the back.

lines.speaker: joey

lines.text: So, what happens to the old guys?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, they go into the chipper.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Why, do I have a feeling thats not as happy as it sounds?  No! Nooooo!!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey! Hey!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: ...and these come in the shapes of your favourite Christmas characters, Santa, Rudolph, and Baby Jesus.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: All right, Ill take a box of the cream filled Jesuss.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wait a minute, one box! Come on, Im trying to send a little girl to Spacecamp, Im putting you down for five boxes. Chandler, what about you?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ahh, do you have any coconut flavoured deities?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No, but ah, theres coconut in the Hanukkah Menoreoes. I tell you what, Ill put you down for eight boxes, one for each night.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Mon?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: All right, Ill take one box of the mint treasures, just one, and thats it. I-I started gaining weight after I joined the Brown Birds.  Remember, how Dad bought all my boxes and I ate them all?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ah, no Mon, Dad had to buy everyone of your boxes because you ate them all. But ah, y'know Im sure thats not gonna happen this time, why dont I put you down for three of the mint treasures and just a couple of the Rudolphs.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, come on, now you know you want em.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Dont, dont, dont, dont, dont do this.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ill tell you what Mon, Ill give you the first box for free.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh God! I gotta go!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Come on! All the cool kids are eating em!

lines.text: And when you have a second later, I wanna show you why we dont just trap spiders under coffee mugs and leave them there.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Im training to be better at a job that I hate, my life officially sucks.

lines.text: Well, yeah! Im still pursuing that.

lines.text: Oh, ah nothin. I just felt like hangin out here and reading.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Oh, the water was sooo great! We jumped off this pier and my suit came off.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohhhh, sorry I missed that.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohh-ha-ha!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much easier when I used to shave my head.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Y'know, I gotta tell ya, I just loved your look when you were bald.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Really?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohh!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Because I think about shaving it all off again sometime.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Really?!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I mean you definitely should do that.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Y'know what, I should do it.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are soo cool.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Awww, stop. Come on. Now go shave that head!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: All right.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Whats the matter, Pheebs?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: She cancelled! My namesake cancelled on me!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, she clamed she had to go out of town suddenly. Shes avoiding me, she doesnt want to tell me where my Father is. She knows, and she wont tell me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Aww Pheebs, that sucks!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, well, dont Aww Pheebs, that sucks! me yet.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Where ya going?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well, shes out of town so, theres gotta be something in her house that tells me where my Father is.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Uh, Pheebs, some people call that breaking and entering.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well, are any of those people here?!

lines.speaker: all
lines.text: Oh, no!! No, no!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay, look I-I-I do something nice, okay? Ill-Ill fill her ice trays.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Hey, everybody!

lines.speaker: all
lines.text: Wow!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wh-haa-haa! Look what cha did!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: You wanna touch it?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Nooo, but it, but its great.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Come on, touch it!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay.  You can feel all the bones in your skull.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hi!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I was having a little chat with ah, Bonnie, and ah, guess what, she-she happened to bring up y'know, who was behind the um, whole head shaving idea, and now, who was it? Oh, thats right, thats right, it was you!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: That was her idea, I just gave her a nudge.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: She said you gave her the razor!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Hey guys.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: So, anyone up for a midnight dip in the ocean?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ahh, no, Im good.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Okay, Ill see you in a bit.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay, have fun! Wooo!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Come on see, she doesnt look that bad.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You can see the moonlight bouncing off her head! What the hell were you thinking?!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I dont know.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You dont know?! Rach, you balded my girlfriend!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: All right! Ross, do you think its easy for me to see you with somebody else?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Y'know, hey! Youre the one who ended it, remember?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You still love me?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Noo.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You still love me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Noo, nnnnn. What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get back together?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Noo! Maybe! I, I dont know. Ross, I still cant forgive you for what you did, I cant, I just, but sometimes when Im with you I just, I feel so...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I just, I feel, I-I just...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I feel...

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Noo!! I dont care! Im not, Im not gonna playing one-on- one strip poker with you for practice!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: But I made cards!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well! Good night.  Im going upstairs.

lines.speaker: joey and chandler
lines.text: Gnight.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Wanna play strip poker for practice?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ow! My ass. Okay. Okay.  Oh, shhh!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No! No!! Its me! Its me! I-I didnt want to make any noise!

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: Then don't break in!!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Im sorry.

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: What are you doing here?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I-I, came to fill your ice cube trays.

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Umm, okay, okay, look. I took this picture from your fridge. Okay, because I know that this is my Father. Yeah, this is Frank Buffay and you are standing right there next to him. Now, look I deserve to know where I came from. All right? So if you can help me find my Father then you should! Otherwise, youre just mean!  So, just tell me the truth!

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: All right, the man in the picture is Chuck Magioni.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: My Father is Chuck Magioni?

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: No, no, thats just Chuck Magioni, I-I sold him a house last year! And Im very sorry, but I dont know where your Father is, and thats the truth.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh.

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: But umm, youre right. I think that a person should know where they come from. Wh-which is why I ah,  ahh,  okay. Im your mother.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Heh?

lines.speaker: phoebe sr
lines.text: Y'know I wanted to tell you yesterday, but I just, I kinda felt all floopy, and...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Im telling ya, you guys are totally getting back together!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Thats not true! Her, she doesnt even know what she wants! Rachels still mad about the whole thing.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay, then you gotta back away, all right? You dont need that kindve hurt. Take it from a guy whos never had a long term relationship......

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I know, but ahhhhhh!! I really wanna go up there and finish that kiss!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ahhhh!

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: You guys, the waters great. You should really go in.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, ahh, no thanks, I just had an M&M.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Okay, well gnight.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Good night.

lines.speaker: bonnie
lines.text: Dont be too long.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okey-dokey!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: There is not one hair on that head.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey, itll grow back, right? And she-shes really fun, and shes cool, and-and Im finally moving on. Y'know? I mean getting over Rachel was so , y'know? Y'know, and Im finally feeling sane again. And now if I go up there, and-and I kiss her, and, Gooood I wanna kiss her, and-and-and it doesnt work out, right? Do I really wanna put myself through that again?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: So let me get this straight. If you go with Bonnie tonight, youre doing the smart, healthy thing and moving on.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Right, and you go with Rachel, Bonnies free tonight?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hi there.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Thats that weird voice again.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay! Okay! Let me try it again, youre gonna wanna date this next guy, I swear!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hi! Im Dorf! Youre date for the evening.  Oh come on! Dorf on dating, thats good stuff!!
